mapper.select:
select data_id, expert_id, user_id, achievement_name, finish_people, industry_id, industry_name, achievement_keys, publish_date, achievement_desc, achievement_level, achievement_type, owner_contract_name, owner_contract_id, owner_project_id, owner_project_name, compan_id, company, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6, sys_flag, data_order, del_flag, create_date, create_user, create_user_disp, modify_date, modify_user, modify_user_disp from zjk_achievement where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and expert_id like '%${expertId}%'
and user_id like '%${userId}%'
and achievement_name like '%${achievementName}%'
and finish_people like '%${finishPeople}%'
and industry_id like '%${industryId}%'
and industry_name like '%${industryName}%'
and achievement_keys like '%${achievementKeys}%'
and publish_date like '%${publishDate}%'
and achievement_desc like '%${achievementDesc}%'
and achievement_level like '%${achievementLevel}%'
and achievement_type like '%${achievementType}%'
and owner_contract_name like '%${ownerContractName}%'
and owner_contract_id like '%${ownerContractId}%'
and owner_project_id like '%${ownerProjectId}%'
and owner_project_name like '%${ownerProjectName}%'
and compan_id like '%${companId}%'
and company like '%${company}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
and sys_flag like '%${sysFlag}%'
and data_order like '%${dataOrder}%'
and del_flag like '%${delFlag}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_disp like '%${createUserDisp}%'
and modify_date like '%${modifyDate}%'
and modify_user like '%${modifyUser}%'
and modify_user_disp like '%${modifyUserDisp}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
